Gainsborough Community Library

Manager: Mandy Grimwood

Clapgate Lane, Ipswich
IP3 0RL

Tel: 01473 260888
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Voices for Gainsborough Community Library

Social media:

  • Facebook

Branch updates

Please note that the library is self-service only until 9:30am Monday-Saturday.

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash and cheques accepted. Call 01473 351249 for card payments.
  • Parking: small car park available at rear of library
  • Out-of-hours book return available
  • Customer toilet
  • Refreshments: available in our caf√©
  • Display space: two cork boards in cafe area for A3, A4 or A5 posters

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Borrow an eReader
  • Photocopying: black and white, A4 or A3 available
  • Colour printing: A4 or smaller available
  • Scan to email
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges

Councillor surgeries & professional advice

Citizens Advice Bureau - drop in for an assessment of the help we can offer you

Wednesday, 0930-1230

Family Learning - find out how to support your child's reading at home and help them when they are stuck with reading - free three-week course from Realise Futures starting Wednesday 14 June - to book a place phone Richard Webber on 01473275922

Wednesday, 0915-1115

Local Area Coordinator drop-in: talk to Steve Gray about concerns and opportunities in Gainsborough, Ravenswood and St Helens

Monday, 1300-1500

Fundraising, stalls & book sales

third Thursday of the month, 1800

Privacy & cookies

By using our site you agree to our use of cookies. Find out what cookies we use, how they affect you and how you can control them: our cookie policy.
